name: Sonos
description: This module allows you to control your Sonos music directly in Gladys !
instructionsHTML:
This module allows you to control your Sonos speakers in Gladys.

Need Gladys >= 3.3.

Installation

To install this module :

  • Install the module in Gladys
  • Reboot Gladys
  • Go on the dashboard on Module view, then in the module list press the config button on the sonos module.
  • Your Sonos speakers should appear in the device list.
  • To display the music box, be sure that you have the latest box downloaded by going to Parameters and clicking on Update Gladys data. Then, go in the parameters to box, and add the music box to the dashboard.
instructionsMarkDown:
This module allows you to control your [Sonos speakers](https://developer.gladysproject.com/en/link/sonos-play-1) in Gladys.

Need Gladys >= 3.3. 

### Installation

To install this module :

- Install the module in Gladys
- Reboot Gladys
- Go on the dashboard on Module view, then in the module list press the `config` button on the sonos module.
- Your Sonos speakers should appear in the device list.
- To display the music box, be sure that you have the latest box downloaded by going to `Parameters` and clicking on `Update Gladys data`. Then, go in the parameters to box, and add the `music` box to the dashboard.
